import React from "react"; import AboutBackground from "../Assets/about-background.png"; import AboutBackgroundImage from "../Assets/about-background-image.png"; import { BsFillPlayCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; const About = () => { return (

About

Rallying has never been easier.

RallyHub, established in 2022 by a group of passionate tennis and pickleball players, offers seamless access to top-tier courts in your area.

With instant online booking, RallyHub makes it easier than ever to reserve courts at premier clubs, giving you more time to focus on your game, hassle-free.

); }; export default About;
